doc:
Frank Beal https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frank_Beal 0 Frank Beal (September 11, 1862 – December 20, 1934) was an American actor and film director of the silent film era. He appeared in 42 films between 1910 and 1933. He also directed 41 films between 1910 and 1921. Beal began acting in 1880 and gained fame as a director and an actor. In 1908, he moved from stage to film, with the Selig Polyscope Company. His obituary in the Los Angeles Times called him "one of the first prominent figures of the theatrical industry to desert it and go into motion pictures".He was born in Cleveland, Ohio and died in Hollywood, California.Beal was married to actress Louise Lester and was the father of actress Dolly Beal and actor Scott Beal. Frank_Beal ( September_11_,_1862 – December_20_,_1934 ) was an_American_actor_and_film_director of the_silent_film_era . He appeared in 42_films between 1910_and_1933 . He also directed 41_films between 1910_and_1921 . Beal began_acting in 1880 and gained fame as a_director and an_actor . In 1908 , he moved from stage to film , with the_Selig_Polyscope_Company . His_obituary in the_Los_Angeles_Times called him " one of the_first_prominent_figures of the_theatrical_industry to_desert it and go into motion_pictures " . He was_born in Cleveland_,_Ohio_and died in Hollywood , California.Beal was_married to actress_Louise_Lester and was the_father of actress_Dolly_Beal and actor_Scott_Beal .
